title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5, the perfect addition to your kitchen! This versatile and durable mixer offers a range of features that will make your cooking and baking experience a breeze.

With more than 20 color variants to choose from, you can find the perfect match for your kitchen decor. The KitchenAid 5 boasts a large capacity, allowing you to make up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 bread loaves in a single batch. Its powerful mixing action with 59 touch points ensures thorough and even mixing, thanks to its planetary action design.

Included with the KitchenAid 5 are essential items such as a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and a Pouring Shield. The durable metal construction guarantees long-lasting performance, while the tilt-head design allows easy access to the bowl for effortless ingredient addition.

This mixer offers 10 speeds, giving you full control over your mixing process. Additionally, it comes with more than 10 optional attachments (sold separately) that can be powered by its hub, expanding its functionality even further.

The KitchenAid 5 model also features a comfortable handle on the stainless steel bowl, making it easy to lift and pour. And to top it off, the bowl is dishwasher safe, allowing for quick and easy cleanup.

Upgrade your kitchen with the KitchenAid 5 and enjoy the convenience and versatility it brings to your culinary adventures.

The KitchenAid 5 comes in more than 20 stunning color variants, allowing you to choose the perfect match for your kitchen decor. Its durable metal construction ensures long-lasting performance even in the busiest of kitchens.

Featuring a 5-quart stainless steel bowl, this mixer has a generous capacity that can handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 bread loaves in a single batch. The comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe design make it easy to use and clean.

With 59 touch points and a planetary mixing action, the KitchenAid 5 ensures thorough and consistent mixing every time. It comes with a variety of included items, including a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield.

The KitchenAid 5 offers 10 different speeds, giving you precise control over your mixing. Additionally, it is compatible with more than 10 optional attachments (sold separately), allowing you to expand its functionality and explore new culinary possibilities.

Upgrade your baking game with the KitchenAid 5. Order yours today and experience the convenience and power of this exceptional kitchen appliance.
